# Gráficos

## {#slide2-id data-menu-title="Barras"}

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
penguins |> 
  ggplot(aes(species, 
             fill = species))+
  geom_bar(position = "dodge")+
  labs(x = "Espécies",
       y = "Contagem")+
  theme(legend.position="none")
```

## {#slide3-id data-menu-title="Caixa e bigodes"}

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
penguins |> 
  ggplot(aes(species,
             body_mass_g,
             colour = species))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.colour = NA)+
  geom_jitter(alpha = 0.3, width = 0.15)+
  labs(x = "Espécies",
       y = "Massa corporal (gramas)")+
  theme(legend.position = "none")

```

## {#slide4-id data-menu-title="Dispersão"}

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
penguins |> 
  ggplot(aes(flipper_length_mm, 
             body_mass_g,
             color = sex))+
  geom_point()+
  labs(x = "Comprimento da nadadeira (mm)",
       y = "Massa corporal (g)",
       color = "Sexo")
```

## {#slide6-id data-menu-title="Histograma"}

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| fig-dpi: 600
penguins |> 
  ggplot(aes(body_mass_g))+
  geom_histogram(color = "black",
                 fill = "white")+
  labs(x = "Massa corporal (g)",
                 y = NULL)
```
